input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: This beautiful garden mount weathervane from Weathervane Express features a flag design and is made of 14 gauge steel with an antique copper finish. The sealed ball bearings in the wind cup ensure easy and fluid movement. This garden mount weathervane comes with a 60 inch mounting rod. It is designed for outdoor installation only. Please note that this is a garden mount weathervane and does not include a roof mount.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
